Riverside.Galleria at Tyler:
Galleria at Tyler, formerly known as Tyler Mall, is a shopping mall located in Riverside, California, United States. It opened on October 12, 1970 as a one-story, two-anchor retail destination for the steadily-growing Inland Empire.
In 1973 a third anchor store, May Company California, opened to occupy the never-used building alongside the original two, J. C. Penney and The Broadway.
